message.content:
cs.SE, cs.HC, cs.CR, cs.SY, cs.DC. 

The paper focuses on using runtime verification to check specifications in a smart apartment, which falls under the category of software engineering (cs.SE) and human-computer interaction (cs.HC). The paper also discusses the complexity of the smart apartment system and the need for decentralized specifications, which could fall under the categories of cryptography and security (cs.CR), systems and control (cs.SY), and distributed, parallel, and cluster computing (cs.DC).
